alert.note: Alert for Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 12:59AM EDT until August 16 at 1:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lanier County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... * Until 145 AM EDT. * At 1259 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Valdosta, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Valdosta, Moody Air Force Base, Meigs, Naylor, Barretts, Hansell and Stockton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
